mapper.insert: INSERT INTO C_CARS (car_id, CAR_NUMBER, OWNER_ID, CAR_MODEL, MANUFACTURER, ENGINE_TYPE, CAR_TYPE, C_YEAR, car_image) VALUES(cars_seq.nextval,#{car_number}, #{owner_id}, #{car_model}, #{manufacturer}, #{engine_type}, #{car_type}, #{c_year}, #{car_image})
mapper.select: SELECT r.CAR_NUMBER ,r.CAR_MODEL ,r.MANUFACTURER ,r.ENGINE_TYPE ,r.CAR_TYPE ,r.C_YEAR ,cm.driver_License_number, r.car_image,r.owner_id,r.car_id,r.car_model ,s.RENT_PRICE,s.RENT_TIME,s.RENT_TIME FROM C_cars r JOIN C_registrations s ON s.car_number = r.CAR_ID JOIN C_MEMBERS cm ON r.OWNER_ID = cm.ID AND cm.ID=#{id}
SELECT nvl(AVG(CAR_SCORE),0) FROM C_REVIEWS cr WHERE cr.CAR_NUMBER IS NOT NULL AND CAR_NUMBER =#{car_number}
SELECT CAR_ID FROM C_CARS cc JOIN C_MEMBERS cm ON cm.ID =cc.OWNER_ID WHERE EMAIl = #{email}
SELECT * FROM C_CARS c WHERE c.OWNER_ID = #{owner_id} AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM C_REGISTRATIONS r WHERE r.CAR_NUMBER = c.CAR_ID )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM C_CARS WHERE CAR_ID= #{car_id} AND OWNER_ID = #{owner_id}
